name: FightingUndersteer-Prototype
description:
FIGHTING UNDERSTEER
  • Controls
  • W.A,S,D for movement
  • Space for Handbrake
  • Use mouse to select options , also the mouse get reactivated when press "ESC". 
  • Concept

The aim of the game is to show glimpses of frustration and produce a fun , addictive car racing game that will entice the user to make errors.

  • Setting

The game is set in a deserted environment with floating roadways , the game is inspired by the world of madmax

  • Game Structure

There will be 3 Tracks for now , each with a different track and terrain layout . The main objective will be the same for the player is to complete the track 4 times over. The players can go to any track at any time as they desire.

Audio done by @vetrix on Instagram
